articles.content: Since the start of 2021, only two batters around the world have been quicker than Jitesh in innings of under 30 balls  •  BCCI

articles.title: Sunil Gavaskar Gives '24 Carat Gold' Advice To Rohit Sharma To Overcome Lean Patch, 'Take Break From IPL' - Cricket Country News
articles.description: Rohit Sharma has made 184 runs in 10 matches with a disappointing average of 18.40 runs in IPL 2023. India great Sunil Gavaskar has suggested Rohit Sharma to take a break from cricket for sometime and get ready for the WTC final.

articles.title: LeBron, Lakers prep for 'next challenge' after winning Game 3 - ESPN - ESPN India
articles.description: A reserved LeBron James, after the Lakers' Game 3 win over Golden State gave Los Angeles a 2-1 series lead, spoke about moving forward in his postgame availability, saying the grind of the playoffs is "all about training your mind for the next challenge."
